documentation.text: @dev returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future
@dev returns the time left for unbonding to finish

@dev Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)
 Emits a {WithdrawUnstakeTokens} event.

@dev get Total Unbonded Tokens

 @param staker: account address

@dev returns the time left for unbonding to finish

@dev Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)
 Emits a {WithdrawUnstakeTokens} event.

 @param staker: account address

SetMinimumValues(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when minimum values are set

SetSTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetUTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetUnstakingLockTime(uint256).details: Emitted when unstaking lock time is set

WithdrawUnstakeTokens(address,uint256,ui.details: Emitted when unstaked tokens are withdrawn

getUnstakeEpochMilestone(uint256).details: returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future

getUnstakeTime(uint256).details: returns the time left for unbonding to finish

setSTokensContract(address).details: Set STokens smart contract. Emits a {SetContract} event.

setUTokensContract(address).details: Set UTokens smart contract. Emits a {SetContract} event.

stake(address,uint256).details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'utok'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens) Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {StakeTokens} event.

unStake(address,uint256).details: UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'stok' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {UnstakeTokens} event.

withdrawUnstakedTokens(address).details: Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Emits a {WithdrawUnstakeTokens} event.
